OOC: the Spider was supposed to be hidden, i'm RPing them to be 
about 2 inches squared...

::Switchblade::
"I'm not trying to explode you or your friends, that bomb went off 
accidentally, I think that Sinnertwin sat on it. The orders were to 
capture the bot, not eat it." He continues into the cave.


On 13 Mar 2001, at 7:37, Alloran2@... wrote:

> :::Wheeljack/Hun-Grr/Banzai-Tron/Airazor:::
> 
> Wheeljack: Then lets do that.  I think we can get this project done in a 
> flash with the proper materials, so lets salvage the ship.
> ::He heads for the mainland::
> ~~~~~
> ::As he sees Condor fall into stasis lock, he starts laughing maniacally, but 
> when he sees the spider explode under Sinnertwin, he looks at Switchblade::
> Hun-Grr: What for you try to explode us?
> ~~~~~
> ::Banzai-Tron was in heavy stasis lock, with his spark punctured as well. He 
> needed repairs quick, or he'd die::
> ~~~~~
> ::Airazor starting to come to.  Memories of a huge bot that tried to kill her 
> flshed in her head. She looks over to Tigerhawk::
> Airazor: Wh-what happened?
>
